sucker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who is easily tricked or persuaded to do something
sucker.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: You fell for that old line? Sucker!

sucker.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a part of a plant that grows from the root or lower stem to become a new plant
sucker.translation[0].definitions[4].def: a flat round piece of rubber that sticks to a surface by suction
